previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. New York Red Bulls | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Montreal Impact 2, New York Red Bulls 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Although the Montreal Impact and New York Red Bulls both took leads on Saturday afternoon, neither team could hold on for its first win of the season.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Montreal Impact vs New York Red Bulls

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Ibrahim Sekagya defensive instinct stops ball inches from goal line

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Samantha M.
timelineItems.text: Interesting line-up without the star players and I like the change up. #RBNY Wright-Phillips up top alone is perfect.

timelineItems.name: Cynthia Cianciusi
timelineItems.text: I had missed this... LET'S GO LES BOYS! #IMFC http://t.co/IL45b2yDKn

timelineItems.name: Cynthia Cianciusi
timelineItems.text: I had missed this... LET'S GO LES BOYS! #IMFC http://t.co/IL45b2yDKn

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Petke finally changes his formation. I guess that inadvertent shift to a 433 last week opened his eyes. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Key to the game for the Red Bulls is play of central midfielders. Alexander and Convey have little to no reps with another. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello.

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: Does anyone know exactly why Armando & Eckersley were viewed as better than Holgy & Barklage? #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Robles with a great stop to stymie a blast from Di Vaio. Not enough pressure in midfield. Alexander as DM not working right now. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Oli
timelineItems.text: Je vois des petits flocons de neige tomber... Pourrons-nous terminer le match? #stadeolympique #IMFC #sarcasm

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Felipe Martins tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: AttitudeAJM
timelineItems.text: Where would the Red Bulls be without Robles? #mtlvny

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Not. Good start for #RBNY . will it bring back the demons of the past for this franchise and unravel? I know it's early season #MTLvRBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Ibrahim Sekagya stops Romero shot inches from goal

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Peguy Luyindula with close opportunity charging the goal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: More Like Tim HEEL
timelineItems.text: I'm shocked that a team where Peguy Luyindula gets the armband would play this poorly. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked.
Attempt missed. Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lloyd Sam.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Festival offensif pour #IMFC qui trouve des espaces. Felipe, souvent seul. Aucun milieu défensif chez les #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Michael Jiang
timelineItems.text: How did that stay out!?!? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Rob G
timelineItems.text: I hate that im relieved by seeing Roy Miller #rbny

timelineItems.name: Marc-Alexandre P.
timelineItems.text: Save of the week pour le mec de #RBNY !!!

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: People critiquing defensive "bite" for #RBNY; they are plenty physical. Missing awareness, speed of thought. #MTLvNY #WhereIsHolgersson

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: I think that is the 3rd time we had a ball.cleared off the line this season. My laaawd. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth Rancourt
timelineItems.text: Mes amis de #IMFC je me pose une question... Pkoi Bernier n'est pas sur le terrain? Question d'une fille qui s'ennuie de #IMFC ;(

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Thierry Henry Not
timelineItems.text: Shep is so old-school, I expect him to yell, "Hey, you damn kids. Get off my lawn!" #RBNY #NoToTechnology #PlayOnTheDamnTurf #TitiTurfToe

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Eric Miller (Montreal Impact).
Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Felipe Martins.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marco Di Vaio shoots it wide

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Donc ça ressemble a ça @impactmontreal quand Romero et Felipe hausse leur jeu au niveau de Di Vaio et Mapp ?? C'est le fun. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: Robert Hak
timelineItems.text: does #RBNY know the game started 17 mins ago?

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Aaron Llena
timelineItems.text: #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Vincent D Lavictoire
timelineItems.text: Why isnt Dax McCarthy in the starting 11? Montreal easily overcrowding the midfield and moving quickly to attack. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: {GIF} Sekagya's goal line clearance. Wow: http://t.co/emIib1Ot7v #MTLvNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Lloyd Sam floating ball easily controlled by Troy Perkins

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: Allez Montréal! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thierry Henry Not
timelineItems.text: It's not so much the turf in Montreal. I just can't understand French-Canadian. #MTLvNY #RBNY #TitiTurfToe

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Montreal Impact 2, New York Red Bulls 2.

timelineItems.name: Glenn Williams
timelineItems.text: Four games unbeaten! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @NewYorkRedBulls have 4 draws in 5 games in @MLS 2014, it took them 15 games in 2013 to reach 4 draws. Even. #MTLvNY

timelineItems.desc: The Montreal Impact and New York Red Bulls have engaged in some wild contests over their brief history against each other, and another could be on offer when the clubs face off Saturday afternoon at Olympic Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Montreal Impact vs New York Red Bulls | April 5, 2014

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: Number of players slipping on the #OlympicStadium turf is mind-boggling. Why this surface? #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles with fast hands stops Di Vaio in his tracks

timelineItems.name: Andy Mailly-Pressoir
timelineItems.text: Je sais pas ce qu'a mangé Di Vaio avant le match, mais j'en veux! #IMFClive #Partout

timelineItems.name: Robert Hak
timelineItems.text: Bradly Wright-Philips is the 2014 version of the 2013 Luyindula. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrés Romero with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: Why is this game being played at the Olympic stadium? It's 37 degrees in Montreal, I'm sure games have been played in colder weather #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #IMFC look like a football juggernaut here - could easily be up 3-0 after 22 mins. - seen nothing from undermanned #RBNY so far #MLS #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: The #RBNY defense is getting brunt of the criticism but midfield is where breakdowns are really happening. Too much space between the two.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio finding a nice target space between Kimura and Armando. If that isn't shutdown, #RBNY will suffer for it #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Benoit Berthiaume
timelineItems.text: Go Impact #imfc @impactmontreal

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Heath Pearce.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Penalty non ? #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Di Vaio misses opportuntiy and flicks it over the crossbar

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Good non-call. Di Vaio had me fooled for sure. #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Thought for sure that the weekly PK tradition was in effect #MTLvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Romero.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Ibrahim Sekagya.
Attempt saved. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: More Like Tim HEEL
timelineItems.text: Luis Robles has a knack for making world class saves when we're already losing. He's a goalkeeping A-Rod. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Alexander definitely struggling at DM, but not sure it's position that plays to his strengths. Petke's tactics thus far here puzzling. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Richard Scott
timelineItems.text: So much room to run, Di Vaio is going to be exhausted soon ;) #bleublancnoir

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: If they go into the half like this, Obekop has to get some time, right? Perhaps even Akpan. This team desperately needs a spark #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Nick Anand
timelineItems.text: Quelle equipe joue contre les Red Bulls? Je ne l'ai jamias vu. #imfclive

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) header from very close range is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marco Di Vaio heads it over the crossbar

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Bobby Convey.

timelineItems.name: Syd F.
timelineItems.text: Analyse à la Jean-Alain Boumsong : @impactmontreal est bien en place dans cette première minute de jeu :) #IMFC http://t.co/ovNToU1suk

timelineItems.name: Syd F.
timelineItems.text: Analyse à la Jean-Alain Boumsong : @impactmontreal est bien en place dans cette première minute de jeu :) #IMFC http://t.co/ovNToU1suk

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Kosuke Kimura.

timelineItems.name: Athena
timelineItems.text: Pretty sure @FKlopas is going to wear a hole in the turf with the pacing #imfclive #stayintheboxfrank

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 1. Jonathan Steele (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Jonny Steele swiftly answers a cross

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Really feels like a matter of when, not if Di Vaio will score today #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Scott Shields
timelineItems.text: Oh hi there, Jonny Steele. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: What a ball by Lloyd Sam! Perfect cross, and Steele makes it 1-1! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Siniša Šindik
timelineItems.text: Et souvent comme ça arrive dans le monde du sport, #IMFC domine, rate plusieurs chances et voilà que le Red Bull égalise. 1-1 à la 32e min.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Roy Miller.

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Once again, Lloyd Sam = #RBNY offense #MTLvNY

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 2. Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Peguy Luyindula boots it passed Perkins

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Now Peguy?! Surely you jest #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Enrico S
timelineItems.text: And that is why you need to finish your chances... #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: Peguy Luyindula: #RBNY leading scorer. No, I'm not kidding.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @NewYorkRedBulls 2-1 @impactmontreal. Luyindula capitalizes on an #imfc turnover to give #rbny the lead: http://t.co/Di8bCHjmGx #MTLvNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Hassoun Camara tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Avec un club normal après 30 min, il aurait dû mener 3-0. Ce club #imfc perd 2-1

timelineItems.name: Michael Leach
timelineItems.text: Dreadful giveaway sets up for #RBNY go ahead goal against run of play from Luyindula. Shameful stuff from #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: newyorkredbulls
timelineItems.text: @jonnysteele and Peguy!!!!!!!!!!!! #rbny #runwithus

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Alex Porras
timelineItems.text: Que s'est-il passé avec la domination outrageuse de #IMFC? La défensive n'emboîte malheureusement pas le pas à l'attaque... #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Quelle façon de faire basculer un match. Tout allait si bien, mais les erreurs rattrapent encore l'Impact #RDS #MLS #IMFC

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @NewYorkRedBulls' Lloyd Sam is now tied with @oba_martins and @mdr7 with the @MLS 2014 assists lead with 3. Dealing. #MTLvNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Rëggë
timelineItems.text: Match pénible pour les latéraux Pearce & Miller La venue de McInerney et retour de Di Vaio sont des bonnes nouvelles mais la défense #IMFC

timelineItems.name: John Fischer
timelineItems.text: How do you not cover the one ace on Montreal? #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Julian McKenzie
timelineItems.text: With so many players out for #NYRB, this is prime time for #IMFC to get the ball rolling. #3Points

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Romero.
Hand ball by Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Kevin Cossette
timelineItems.text: Bernier il embarque quand? #IMFC need the captain on

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Klopas pendant le but : "We make 2 mistakes and we give two goals" #IMFC #RDS #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Jonathan Steele
timelineItems.title: MISS: Roy Miller with incredible momentum blasts it too high

timelineItems.name: Justin E. Brightbill
timelineItems.text: Have terrible CBs? Keep the ball far far away from them. #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jonathan Steele.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: #RBNY goal spurt telling of what team is about. Not sexiest or most talented, but when #IMFC took foot off pedal, they kept hustling #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: La défense de l'Impact très amorphe. Les deux buts ont sapé le moral. #imfc

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross following a c

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Ibrahim Sekagya.

timelineItems.name: AttitudeAJM
timelineItems.text: Tons of space in the final third. Convinced Miller is trying to put one in orbit. #mtlvny

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls).
Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: James
timelineItems.text: Didn't think there was a defense worse than ours, untill I saw Montreal's #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Rëggë
timelineItems.text: J'en peux plus de Ferrari!! Trop lent, toujours au sol, hors position c'est pathétique. Wake up!! #IMFC #debatssf

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: NY Red Bulls WUFC
timelineItems.text: That should've been 3. I'm not confident that #RBNY can win this game with a one-goal lead. #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: tiffany giovia
timelineItems.text: fine, I don't hate the back line. #RBNY #torturedfan

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 2.

timelineItems.name: John
timelineItems.text: J'espère que les #Habs vont offrir un meilleur spectacle que l'#IMFC ce soir.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: Andrew Romero tucks it into the far corner: http://t.co/kZRj8rOuti #MTLvNY

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 2.

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Second half underway at the Olympic Stadium. #IMFC trails 2-1 vs #RBNY. Who’ll get the equalizer? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Das Fro
timelineItems.text: So, yeah... let's keep starting Steele and Peguy, guys. That seems to work well. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Penalty missed! Still  Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 2. Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the right post with a right footed shot

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty New York Red Bulls. Bradley Wright-Phillips draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Marc Belletete
timelineItems.text: Est-ce encore les arbitres de remplacements? #MLS #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Second half is underway. McCarty subbed in for Miller. Convey now at left back, Alexander pushed further forward, McCarty at DM. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Penalty missed! Still  Montreal Impact 1, New York Red Bulls 2. Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the right post with a right footed shot.
Attempt missed. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is too high following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: jeremy filosa
timelineItems.text: Quand tu mènes 12-5 dans les chances de marquer et 6-1 aux corner et tu perds, c'est pas trop normal. PK pour NY dans un instant. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Yann
timelineItems.text: Ferrari you dumb dumb #IMFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).
Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Barre horizontale je t'aime #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Penalty manque et pas d'expulsion pour Ferrari. Enorme cadeau pour #IMFC.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Péguy Luyindula.

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: We're screaming Péguy's name for a different reason this half. #OhBoy #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Massimo
timelineItems.text: Manu con il nonno allo stadio #goimpact #montreal #imfc #impact #lifeisgoodbro

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: 5e contre Montréalais, Romero 1-0 #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: Superbe service de Felipe pour Romero. 1-0 Impact 5e minute. #imfclive #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello.

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: If referee considers that a foul, then he has to show the red to Ferrari. Clear goal scoring opportunity. #IMFC #NYRB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Felipe Martins tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Mike Petke a toute les raisons du monde d'etre furieux. Ridicule decision de ne pas sanctionner Ferrari si donne un penalty. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Viking Jesus
timelineItems.text: Missed the penalty. That's so Metro. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: People surprised to hear Petke curse on TV CLEARLY have never been to an #RBNY practice #Salty #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Bradley Wright-Phillips tries a through ball, but Lloyd Sam is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Alex Porras
timelineItems.text: 50' Robles stoppe un tir de Di Vaio du bout des doigts! J'en reviens pas de la quantité de chances ratées par #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Thanks Dad! RT @NTGBandit: I would like to thank my dad for the RBNY missed penalty. He jinxed them. #IMFC #yesisoundlikeim5

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: There's talk about Robles going to Brazil? By anyone other than Shep? #RBNY #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one who thinks that Di Vaio is being forced to play too much as a midfielder today? #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: IF #RBNY gets 3 pts out of this game, Robles has to be in consideration for the GK spot in the Best XI (for the 3rd time in 4 wks).

timelineItems.text: Le ballon veut vrmt pas rentrer... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Frankie
timelineItems.text: Kimura certainly gives his body to this team #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Annie B
timelineItems.text: C'est parti pour #um02 #imfc #ultras

timelineItems.name: nina
timelineItems.text: Really. So it's gonna be one of those games. Got it. #RBNY

Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: That was just too easy. Armando turned too easily. Defense was flat. #RBNY in a familiar position.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 1-0 Impact. Romero. Superbe tacle de Bernardello qui a lancé la contre-attaque #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: bishopvillered
timelineItems.text: Knee to the chest for Kimura. That'll sort you out. #IMFC #IMFCLive

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Gorgeous goal from Felipe who towers (yes he did) over the NY defense and heads a Jus tin Mapp Cross!! 2-2 #IMFC #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: Felipe de la tête. 2-2 à la 60ème minute. Il nous disait hier qu'il avait travaillé sa précision à la blague cette semaine. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: Credit to #MTL for not just having their doc look at Kimura, but thoroughly check him out before he returns. Right thing to do. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: I was just about to say after a poor start New York has settled nicely and then BOOM #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BUUUUUUT! Felipe makes it 2-2 in Montreal: http://t.co/nxqia9AO3J #MTLvNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Heath Pearce tries a through ball, but Marco Di Vaio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Peter Knox
timelineItems.text: #RBNY that's not on Robles. That's on our back line where we can't match up well enough to protect a lead we should still have. Boo.

timelineItems.name: SoccerMom
timelineItems.text: @jmapp21 is just too good to be true! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: LFTR
timelineItems.text: Bravo! À bcp d'autres centaines! RT “@impactmontreal: Felipe a marqué le 100e but #IMFC en @MLS! WOOOOOO! #IMFClive”

timelineItems.name: riadh khelifi
timelineItems.text: Pour mon anniversaire à venir, je veux recevoir en cadeau le pied gauche de Justin Mapp #IMFClive #IMFC

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: 30 minutes pour renverser le match, pour accrocher une première victoire cette saison ! Come on !! #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Peguy Luyindula.
timelineItems.title: BLOCKED: Lloyd Sam shot from inside the box stopped by Armando

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Ibrahim Sekagya.
Attempt blocked. Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross.

timelineItems.name: riadh khelifi
timelineItems.text: Pourquoi ne pas insérer Justin Mapp en meneur de jeu derrière Di Vaio et McEnerney pour les prochains matchs #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Péguy Luyindula.

timelineItems.name: bishopvillered
timelineItems.text: Mapp.... that cross... good grief. #IMFC #IMFCLive

timelineItems.name: Marie-Isabelle Pépin
timelineItems.text: Mapp est sans aucun doute un des joueurs ayant le plus de coeur au ventre. Mon étoile de ce match... #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Lloyd Barker
timelineItems.text: Finally we see some inter-changing movements between MDV and Felipe. #NYRB defenders can't track them. #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Brooke Tunstall
timelineItems.text: Riddle me this: why is not a foul when a GK runs over a player in the box after the player has shot? If a field player did this... #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Johnny Spinelli
timelineItems.text: This is a hell of an entertaining soccer game. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.
Offside, Montreal Impact. Marco Di Vaio tries a through ball, but Collen Warner is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Has any team been so bad by missing just one piece? #RBNY defense sans Olave is downright attrocious #MTLvNY

timelineItems.name: Gary Hampson
timelineItems.text: Pearce with the assist. So Metro. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.text: Finalement, la cheville droite de Bernardello le fait souffrir #imfc #mls #rds

timelineItems.text: Besoin des deux points supplementaire ! Go #bleublancnoir

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: On ferme la baraque et on garde le score de 2-2? ou on répéte le scénario de Colorado en 2013? #IMFC #RBNY #MTLvNY

timelineItems.text: We need some creativity and more goals. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - Prior to their 4-0 loss in July 2013, Marco Di Vaio had scored in his first 3 appearances against the Red Bulls in @MLS. Poised. #MTLvNY

timelineItems.text: Allez Montréal! #impact #imfc #stadeolympique #montreal

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls doing much better with possession now, but legs are tiring. Petke with 2 subs left in final 10 minutes. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: James
timelineItems.text: I got a baaaad feeling about this game #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Covello
timelineItems.text: Like Petke's thinking: Missing 3 best players, tough win. Start some fringe guys to put everyone on notice - illusion of spots earned. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: El Niño Salvaje
timelineItems.text: Lining up Convey and Alexander in the middle looks suicidal. #RBNY Sekagya will injure himself or Armando will get carded once or twice more

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday afternoon match between the Montreal Impact and New York Red Bulls. Will New York be able to compete if their three best players are missing? Will Justin Mapp have help creating chances? Find out Saturday at 4pm ET on MLS Live in the US and TSN & RDS in Canada.
